name: The Red Beret
description:
The Nazis secretly conducted human experiments on Jews and prisoners of war, and plunged mutants into war. The UK sent a paratrooper team to secretly infiltrate the experimental island to eliminate the super mutants there. Unexpectedly, the plane was shot down by the enemy's Anti-aircraft gun. As the only survivor, Damon is about to complete this seemingly impossible task
The first thing to do is to survive and resist the attacks of the mutants scattered on the island in the first few days
Building bases and weapons with materials obtained through felling trees, mining stones, and collecting resources
Collecting fruits or planting crops to supplement nutrition for the body by capturing prey
There are many types of resources on the island, but you still need to be patient in collecting them
